name: Rit
description:
Rit How to play
  1. Download any build from the releases
  2. Launch the game once then close it
  3. go to the save directory for the game (says location on first launch)
  4. Add songs to the songs folder in their respective folders. (Quaver in quaver, osu in osu, etc.)
  5. Play the game!

For the latest versions, please check the GitHub! https://github.com/GuglioIsStupid/Rit

PLEASE NOTE

It just came to my attention that some osu charts do not work.
